welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jambe, a charming city known for its stunning beaches and rich cultural heritage. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that Jambe has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for low-cost carriers such as AirAsia and Lion Air.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for full-service carriers such as Garuda Indonesia and Singapore Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves international flights for full-service carriers such as Emirates and Qatar Airways.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all terminals for free. Network name may vary depending on the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Halim Perdana Kusuma Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Halim Perdana Kusuma Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Wifi access is free for the first 60 minutes, after which a fee is charged.
